group_1.narration: If I recall my "original resolution"@at the Memory Museum, then I can grow as both@a Magical Girl and as a Coordinator...
That's what Livia told me,@then I ended up inside of this book.
That's when I remembered myself@right after "the incident."
...At that time, someone with a gun@broke into the classroom at my school,@and I was offered as a "sacrifice" by my classmates.
But it was everyone else who was killed.@Because of the wish I "chose,"@everyone else is dead.
After that, I became afraid to "choose."@In that moment, the thought of me just quietly@being killed was the only thing spinning in my mind.
This is my memory of that time.
I wanted to die to atone,@but I couldn't choose between living or dying.
I started exterminating Witches since@I was told it's a Magical Girl's "mission."
If it's a mission, I thought,@then it can't be helped,@because it wasn't something I chose.

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:1039A01]Fumu!
[flashEffect:flashRed2][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:103900:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Fumuu...!

group_1.narration: But I was so weak I couldn't even put@a scratch on a Witch...

group_1.textRight: (What do I do, at this rate...)
(...But it would be better@if I just die like this...)
Fu-fumu...

group_1.textLeft: Haven't seen your face around here. You new?@...Wonder if you're an elementary schooler.
...Wait, you. Think I've seen you@somewhere before...
Are you...@Did you survive that incident...?
Knew it...@...Eh, but timing like that...
You...@What the hell did you wish for?
You weren't a part of that incident...@You weren't, right...?

group_1.textRight: (I made a horrible wish...@This girl is going to find me out...!)
(..I have to run.)

group_1.narration: I didn't want to kill everyone.@But still, everyone died all because of my...wish.

group_1.textRight: (I don't want to exterminate Witches...@I'm sure I won't win.)
(...But my Soul Gem, it's getting@really cloudy.)
(Kyubey said that Witches@can make criminals,)
(like the one who attacked@all of us...)
(It's my mission...so I don't@have a choice, right?)

group_1.narration: I've never beaten a Witch before,@so I haven't gotten a Grief Seed,@and the more I fight,@the cloudier my Soul Gem gets...

group_1.textRight: (Just like before, my attacks@don't do any good at all...!)
[flashEffect:flashRed2][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:103900:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Fuguuu...!
Fu-fumu...

group_1.narration: "You too will carry your sins and die."@What that criminal said back then@has been stuck in my head since.
But "live on for those who died"...@was something people were telling me too.@I couldn't choose between either.
But if I'm killed by a Witch, if I die,@I wouldn't have to choose anything anymore,@so wouldn't that be easier?@...Is all I thought.

group_1.textRight: (Yes...I can finally...@carry my sins...and die...)

group_1.textLeft: You doin' okay there?!@I'll get ya purified right away.

group_1.textRight: (Why...help me...@I was ready to die...)
Ahh, you're up. If yer lookin' fer@the Witch, it's gone now.
Well, I ain't the one who beat it.@That's on the other Magical Girl.
I'm just like ya, not so good@at the Witch huntin', ya see.
I get some help from time ta time.
...Oh, nearly forgot to introduce maself.
I'm Livia Medeiros, traveling Coordinator.
But enough about me, how's your body doin'?@Your magic's lookin' filled up.

group_1.textLeft: (My body...? Now that she's mentioned it,@it feels a little light?)

group_1.textRight: That's what ya call a "Coordination."
...So, without further ado,@how'd ya like to be a Coordinator, too?
Guess ya'd be at a loss havin' that sprung on ya.@I'll give ya the quick rundown for now.

group_1.narration: "So about this Coordinator thing...@It's a business of fiddlin' with@a Magical Girl's Soul Gem, strengthening@their abilities or makin' them easier ta use."
"In return, the Magical Girl@pays me with a Grief Seed."
"Some of the girls rush in with injuries,@but this ain't exactly a hospital.@Well, Coordinations can help@the recovery process, s'pose."

group_1.textRight: And ya have the qualities to becomin'@a Coordinator yourself.
Whoops, customer.@Why don't ya come help me a bit?
